articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: Neptune-sized exoplanet is too big for its host star - Ars Technica
articles.description: Stars this small shouldn't make planets this big.
articles.content:
9
You win some, you lose some. Earlier this week, observations made by the Webb Space Telescope provided new data that supports what we thought we understood about planet formation. On Thursday, wor… [+4700 chars]
